name: mura toka
description:
small walking simulator.

explore a mysterious island and its structures and dive into a fantastic experience.

take a break from stressful mainstream games and take a vacation to mura toka.

it takes about 15min.

colorful.

_______________________________________________

Recommended Requirements:

Windows:

OS: Windows 7 or later

Processor: 1.7GHz Dual Core (4th generation i5 or equivalent) or better

Memory: 4 GB RAM

Graphics: 512MB DirectX 9.0 compatible graphics card (shader model 2) or better

DirectX: Version 9.0

Storage: 300 MB available space
